general_info.summary: This document outlines various academic programs and administrative functions for the 2025-26 academic year across different schools within Sharda University, including Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, and Nursing Science & Research. It also details key reports and initiatives such as examination reports, Academic Bank of Credits, curricula feedback, university brochures, leadership information, statutory bodies, tenders, COVID-19 related information, capacity development and skill enhancement programs, entrepreneurship initiatives, FM radio services, accommodation fees, visa and insurance guidelines, and mentoring portals.

academicPrograms.programName: Master of Science in Computer Science
academicPrograms.eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field with a minimum GPA of 3.0.
requiredDocuments: Official transcripts from all previous institutions

academicPrograms.programName: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
academicPrograms.eligibilityCriteria: High school diploma or equivalent with a minimum GPA of 2.8.

career_info.summary: This text outlines potential career paths and further academic pursuits available after completing a course in humanities and social sciences. It suggests options such as pursuing higher education through M.Phil and Ph.D degrees, or entering professions like writing or recruitment, highlighting the support of "Our Recruiters" in this process.
career_info.raw_content:

• Higher Education: M.Phil & Ph.D
• Writers
